cocktailDescription: 알렉산더 칵테일은 브랜디를 기본 주재료로 하며, 크렘 드 카카오와 신선한 크림이 함께 어우러지는 부드러운 칵테일입니다. 강한 술 맛을 좋아하지 않는 분들에게 추천할 만하며, 매끈한 카카오 향이 맛있게 퍼지는 따뜻한 감동을 선사합니다. 이 칵테일은 1920년대에 유명한 바텐더 헤리아틀레이가 만들었으며, 칵테일 파티에서 인기있습니다.
For a change of pace, an Amaretto Sour is just the thing. The recipe with the extra kick!
A sweet cocktail is the Americano, which you can prepare quickly and easily with this recipe.
With curaao and vodka, the drink turns beautifully blue. The Angel Blue cocktail is a quaffable drink - not just for angels.
The Aperol Lillet has only 3 ingredients, but you can always pimp the drink - here is the quick recipe.
A great summer drink is the Aperol Sour. This cocktail recipe is served with Ice Cubes and an Orange Slice in the glass.
An apple juice soda gin is guaranteed to taste good in a cozy gathering. Serve the recipe with apple chips.
Apricot Brandy and Sparkling Wine are the main ingredients to this cocktail that will make the sun rise in your heart with the Apricot Sunset.
The burning shooter with real Kahlua rum and Cointreau knocks out even the strongest guys. B-52 II is not for beginners!
A delightful cocktail recipe. The Bacardi cocktail should not be missing from any party.
A Bahama Mama is Fruity and tasty. Summer feeling is pre-programmed with this recipe. Let them seduce you!
The centerpiece of the Bellini is the pureed peach piece. A classic cocktail with prosecco, reminiscent of dolce vita.
Between the Sheets doesn't skimp on alcohol. But it's the mix that makes a good cocktail. You can't go wrong with this recipe.
